prefixIntro.title: 基础综合
prefixIntro.description: 包含描述感觉、人物关系、学科以及自然现象的基础词汇。
prefixIntro.imagery: 五彩斑斓的拼图，组成了丰富多彩的世界。

words.imagery: 一张面无表情的脸，嘴巴呈直线，表示毫无兴趣。

sentences.en: The job was boring.

words.rootVisual: <circle cx='12' cy='12' r='10' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><path d='M8 10 h2 M14 10 h2' stroke='currentColor'/><line x1='9' y1='15' x2='15' y2='15' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2'/>
words.imagery: 因为厌倦而眼神呆滞或翻白眼的样子。

sentences.en: I am bored with the job.
sentences.cn: 我对这份工作感到厌倦。

words.imagery: 家族树的分支，连接着同辈的亲属。

sentences.en: I have three cousins.
sentences.cn: 我有三个堂(表)兄弟姐妹。

sentences.en: My cousin lives in London.

words.imagery: 一颗实心的星星，代表它是所有选项中被选中的、最好的那一个。

sentences.en: What's your favorite book?
Red is my favorite color.
sentences.cn: 红色是我最喜欢的颜色。

words.imagery: 一个漂浮的气球或笑脸，代表轻松和快乐。

sentences.en: My father is a fun man.
We had a lot of fun at the party.
sentences.cn: 我们在派对上玩得很开心。

words.imagery: 一个小丑的红鼻子，让人觉得滑稽可笑。

sentences.en: It is funny that the man wears like this.
sentences.cn: 那个男人穿成这样真滑稽。

words.imagery: 高耸的山峰和崎岖的地形，象征着对地球 (Geo) 面貌的记录与描绘 (Graphy)。

sentences.en: I love geography very much.
I want to be a geographer.
sentences.cn: 我想成为一名地理学家。

sentences.en: Study habits are very important.
Smoking is a bad habit.

words.imagery: 联想一个人彻底“躺平”，双手枕在脑后，翘着二郎腿，把紧绷的神经向后（Re-）完全松开（Lax）。

sentences.en: You should learn to relax after a long time of work.
sentences.cn: 工作很久后你应该学会放松。

sentences.en: Lying on the beach is very relaxing.
Let's go to the beach this weekend.

sentences.en: I sweat a lot in summer.
Running in the heat makes me sweat.

sentences.en: I love the wild horses in the picture. They are so lovely.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢照片里的野马。它们太可爱了。

sentences.en: She is afraid of the dark.

sentences.cn: 我会在晚上10点前到达那里。

sentences.en: Stay away from the fire.

sentences.en: I often play badminton with my dad on weekends.
sentences.cn: 我周末常和爸爸打羽毛球。

sentences.cn: 许多欧洲人有金色的头发。

sentences.en: I bought a birthday gift for my sister.
sentences.cn: 我给妹妹买了生日礼物。

words.imagery: 由简单的几何积木搭建而成，一个垂直的长方块代表其标志性的长脖子，稳固地连接在身体上。

sentences.en: A giraffe's neck is very long.

words.imagery: 一个人举着一面小旗子，走在前面指引方向。

sentences.en: I dream of being a tour guide.

words.imagery: 经典的8字形琴身轮廓，中心的共鸣孔仿佛是旋律的出口，等待着被拨动的琴弦唤醒。

sentences.en: My cousin plays the guitar so well.

sentences.en: The mountain is very high.

words.imagery: 一个人张开双臂（波浪线），做出欢迎的姿势。

sentences.en: The host served us delicious food.
sentences.cn: 主人招待我们吃了美味的食物。

words.imagery: 大象正面轮廓图，嘴角两侧伸出两根弯曲、洁白的长牙（Ivory），这是它们最显著的特征。

sentences.en: The ivory trade is illegal in China.
sentences.cn: 象牙贸易在中国是非法的。

words.imagery: 双腿分开的裤子形状，经典的牛仔裤轮廓。

sentences.en: I don't like wearing jeans because they are too tight.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢穿牛仔裤，因为太紧了。

words.imagery: 一个杯子插着吸管，旁边有一滴液体（水果精华）。

sentences.en: Which juice do you prefer, orange juice or tomato juice?
sentences.cn: 你喜欢哪种果汁，橙汁还是番茄汁？

words.imagery: 联想高速公路旁的路牌，清晰地标示着“KM”，这是我们在长途旅行中最常见的距离单位。

sentences.en: The road is 1 kilometer long.

sentences.en: People often fly kites in spring.
sentences.cn: 人们经常在春天放风筝。

words.imagery: 标志性的大圆耳朵和黑色大鼻子，这张呆萌的脸庞是澳大利亚最可爱的象征。

sentences.en: The koala is a symbol of Australia.
sentences.cn: 考拉是澳大利亚的象征。
